smart_contract:
from pyteal import *

primary_receiver = Addr("5L3W7TMQCFPSH7WHV4ZH2XIUDHWHI5HNKQ6TNKHRAHPJZVEK7SYLBT43TQ")
maximum_amount = Int(200000)
expiration_time = Int(90000)

def validate_single_transaction():

    group_check = Global.group_size() == Int(1)
    return And(group_check,
        Gtxn[0].type_enum() == TxnType.AssetTransfer,
        Gtxn[0].fee() <= maximum_amount,
        Gtxn[0].xfer_asset() == expiration_time,
        Gtxn[0].asset_receiver() ==  Addr("BN2R5VU5TF2U7JM4DDYN4UGJBPGO7CMCKAPCRSPAD6KXBJLWP53JCDFLG4"),
        Gtxn[0].asset_amount() == expiration_time,
        Gtxn[0].note() == Bytes("Transfer1"), 
        Gtxn[0].rekey_to() == Global.zero_address(),
    )

if __name__ == "__main__":
    print(compileTeal(validate_single_transaction(), mode=Mode.Signature, version=6))
